comments.html: This left me wanting on one more topic: what about the number of VLANs supported by each? Which ones are limited to 4K? Which ones are not and have or can have port-local VLAN IDs?
comments.name: Dmitri Kalintsev

comments.html: Really good question to add to the per-vendor scorecard in the DC Fabrics webinar. Thank you!
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: This is a great summary. Sharing widely.
comments.name: Abner Germanow

comments.html: Super great slide show.  Thanks a lot for sharing.  I didnt quite get why FCOE is a must....all that buys is less cabling/equipment right?  Is it a must for any other reason?
comments.name: Will

comments.html: Can't put everything on the slides or they would be too crowded. It's primarily to reduce server-to-ToR cabling and the number of managed devices (no need for ToR FC switch).
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
